text: Kulwokumenya kwabwe endagaano twabakolimira, emitima gyaabwe netugifuula emikakanyavu nebaba nga bakyusa ebigambo okubijja ku makulu gaabyo amatuufu, nebasuula ekitundu kinene kw'ebyo ebyabayigirizibwa, bulijjo ojja kugwanga ku nkwe zaabwe okugyako abatono mu bo, kale basonyiwe era olekere, anti bulijjo mazima Katonda ayagala abakozi bâ€™obulungi
